tit.j: 桂川パーキングエリア

sen.j: 桂川パーキングエリア（かつらがわパーキングエリア）は、京都府京都市南区 (京都市)久世東土川町の名神高速道路上にあるパーキングエリア。
sen.e: The Katsuragawa Rest Area, located at Kuze-higashi-tsuchikawa Town, Minami Ward, （Kyoto City）, is a rest area on Meishin Expressway
sen.cmt: http://www.excite.co.jp/map/address/26/107/読みがなは訳していません。
sen.e: The Katsuragawa rest area, located at Kuze-higashi-tsuchikawa Town in Minami ward （Kyoto City), is a stop on the Meishin Expressway.
The Katsuragawa rest area, located at Kuze-higashi-tsuchikawa Town in Minami Ward (Kyoto City) Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Meishin Expressway.

sen.j: 道路公団民営化前で唯一名神高速道路の財団法人道路サービス機構のエリアであった。
sen.e: It was the only one rest area operated by Road Service Organization, an incorporated foundation, before privatization of Japan Highway Public Corporation.
sen.cmt: 財団法人道路サービス機構は定訳不明
sen.e: It was the only rest area operated by the Road Service Organization, an incorporated foundation, before the privatization of the Japan Highway Public Corporation.
It was the only rest area operated by the Road Service Organization, an incorporated foundation, before the privatization of the Japan Highway Public Corporation.

sen.j: 以前、大阪府三島郡 (大阪府)島本町（大山崎ジャンクション・大山崎インターチェンジ〜高槻バスストップ間）にあった桜井パーキングエリアが車線拡幅工事の関係で1998年（平成10年）3月に移転したもの。
sen.e: In March 1998, lane widening works next to Sakurai Parking Area at Shimamoto Town, Mishima-gun (Osaka Prefecture) (between Oyamazaki Junction/Oyamazaki Interchange and Takatsuki Bus stop) forced its service to be discontinued, and its facilities have been brought and rebuilt.

In March 1998, lane widening next to the Sakurai Parking Area at Shimamoto Town, Mishima-gun (Osaka Prefecture) (between the Oyamazaki Junction/Oyamazaki Interchange and the Takatsuki bus stop) forced its service to be discontinued, but subsequently the facilities were purchased and rebuilt.

In March 1998, lane widening next to the Sakurai Parking Area at Shimamoto Town, Mishima-gun (Osaka Prefecture) (between the Oyamazaki Junction/Oyamazaki Interchange and the Takatsuki bus stop) forced its service to be discontinued, but subsequently the facilities were purchased and rebuilt.

sen.j: なお、旧桜井PAの場所は高槻第二ジャンクションの用地に転用される。
sen.e: The site of the old Sakurai Rest Area has been used for Takatsuki Second Junction.
sen.cmt: 「なお」は特に訳し出ししていません。
sen.e: The site of the old Sakurai rest area has been used for the Takatsuki Second Junction.
The site of the old Sakurai rest area has been used for the Takatsuki Second Junction.

sen.j: 名称の由来となった桂川自体と、当PAとは、直線で1km強離れている。
sen.e: The Katsura River, the origin of its name, is 1 km away from this Rest Area in a straight line.
The Katsura River, from which its name originates, is located just a kilometer from the rest area.
The Katsura River, from which its name originates, is located just a kilometer from the rest area.

tit.j: 上り線（京都南インターチェンジ・京都東インターチェンジ・大津インターチェンジ・米原ジャンクション方面）
tit.e: Inbound lane (toward Kyoto Minami Interchange, Kyoto Higashi Interchange, Otsu Interchange, and Maibara Junction)
Inbound lane (toward Kyoto Minami Interchange, Kyoto Higashi Interchange, Otsu Interchange and Maibara Junction)
Inbound lane (toward Kyoto Minami Interchange, Kyoto Higashi Interchange, Otsu Interchange and Maibara Junction)

sen.e: For Men: 8 toilets (5 of Japanese style, 3 of Western style), 2urinals
Men: 8 toilets (5 Japanese style, 3 Western style) and 2 urinals
Men: 8 toilets (5 Japanese style, 3 Western style) and 24 urinals
For Women: 34 toilets (24 of Japanese style, 10 of Western style)

Women: 34 toilets (24 Japanese style, 10 Western style)
